MMAI18 Game Announcement and Signups

The signups for MegaMinerAI 18: Saloon are open! Round up your posse of three and go make your team at MegaMinerAI.com. The competition is November 12-13 from high noon to high noon.

MMAI18 Announcement

Prepare yourself for the Fall 2016 return of MegaMinerAI on November 12th-13th. This semester is gonna be bigger than better than ever, so brush off your old trackball mouse and hamster powered laptop.
